Class WarGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • WarGame

  • public class WarGame
extends Object
    WarGame contains functions that aid in the playing of War (Card Game)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarGame(Player p1, Player p2)
      Primary Constructor Initializes a game of War between provided players

      checkEndGame Method Checks if both players have cards remaining in thier decks.

      giveSpoils Method Gives all cards in both player's fields to the winner.

      static void main(String[] args)

      resolveBattle Method Compares the top card of each player's field.
      static void startBattle(Player p1, Player p2)
      startBattle Method Commands each player to play a card face up as long as they both have cards left in thier deck
      static void war(Player p1, Player p2)
      war Method If both players have cards in thier deck remaining, each play a card face down.

      • checkEndGame

        public static int checkEndGame(Player p1,
                               Player p2)
        checkEndGame Method Checks if both players have cards remaining in thier decks. If Player 1's deck is empty, returns 1. If Player 2's deck is empty, returns 2. If Both Players decks are empty, returns 3. Otherwise returns 0.
        Parameters:
        Player - Player 1
        Player - Player 2
